sentence.Network_en: Believing yourself to be in the wrong job can be soul-destroying.
sentence.Network_cn: 认为自己入错了行的想法会使人心灰意冷。

sentence.Network_en: And he found himself trying to suppress a bitterness that was soul - destroying.
sentence.Network_cn: 他发现自己在竭力抑制损伤灵魂的苦涩.

sentence.Network_en: We had the soul - destroying task of clearing up all the mess afterwards.
sentence.Network_cn: 后来我们接受了收拾混乱局面的麻烦差使.

soul - destroying jobs in the factory ., 工厂里极乏味的工作.

entry.tran: 极为枯燥乏味的;令人心灰意冷的
entry.def: Activities or situations that are soul-destroying make you depressed, because they are boring or because there is no hope of improvement.

example.ex: Believing yourself to be in the wrong job can be soul-destroying.
example.tran: 认为自己入错了行的想法会使人心灰意冷。
一次令人沮丧至极的经历

means.word_mean: 1. destructive to the spirit or soul;
